description.value:
Age. Gnomes mature at the same rate humans do, and most are expected to settle down into an adult life by around age 40. They can live 350 to almost 500 years.

Creature Type. You are a Humanoid. You are also considered an gnome for any prerequisite or effect that requires you to be an gnome.

Size. Your size is Small. Gnomes are between 3 and 4 feet tall and average about 40 pounds.

Speed. Your base Speed is 30 feet.

Superior Darkvision. You have Darkvision to a range of 120 feet.

Gift of the Svirfneblin. When you reach character level 3, you can cast the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self} spell with this trait. When you reach character level 5, you can also cast the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplNondetecti]{Nondetection} spell with it. Once you cast Disguise Self or Nondetection with this trait, you cannot cast that spell with it again until you finish a Long Rest. You can also cast these spells using spell slots you have of the appropriate level.

Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells when you cast them with this trait (choose when you select this species). None of these spells require spell components when you cast them with this trait.

Gnome Cunning. You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

Svirfneblin Camouflage. When you make a Stealth check, you can make the check with Advantage. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

advancement.hint: Your size is Small. Gnomes are between 3 and 4 feet tall and average about 40 pounds.

advancement.title: Disguise Self
advancement.hint:
Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the disguise self spell with this trait.   Once you cast disguise self with your Gift of the Svirfneblin trait, you cannot cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast it using spell slots you have of the appropriate level.

Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells when you cast them with this trait (choose below).

advancement.title: Gift of the Svirfneblin
advancement.hint:
Starting at 5th level, you can also cast the nondetection spell with it. Once you cast nondetection with this trait, you cannot cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast these spells using spell slots you have of the appropriate level.

Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells when you cast them with this trait (choose below).

advancement.title: INT Bonus
advancement.hint: Core rule that provides a bonus based on character level and intelligence modifier at levels 6, 12, 18.  Does NOT apply retroactively and is not affected by temporary changes in Intelligence stat (from items or other buffs/debuffs).
